title: Authentication error
body: When i try to log in it writes that "Unable to connect to the authentication service. Check the server status here If is looks good, follow the guide here" i tried many solutions as dns, restarting pc, reinstalling LoL, but it still doesn't work. Can somebody help me?

replies.body:
I'm having a similar problem described here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/UY82UG3U-league-is-stuck-on-authenticating-tried-everyting

And it seems nothing is working for me so far, so you could refer to the comments on my posts if you're looking for more information.
Apparently there is one thing that could work for you, try Port Forwarding!
Here's a video for some details on how to do it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fkxhsxaqkPI
Hope this works for you!

Glad that port forwarding solved the issue! If you're ever having problems with something like that again down the line, do yourself a favor and check through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which also has the steps on port forwarding as well if you need them again, there's a method to the madness ;)
